attributes.action: Allow the critique of any religion in the same way as we can critique any other philosophy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For me, the essence of being British is to have freedom of speech without fear.  This does not mean hate speech - I would never vindicate that.  But if I want to discuss and critique the values of Islam or Christianity or Judaism or communism or nationalism I should be able to do so without fear of persecution, prosecution or vilification.
